Grid

  • Use .col-sm-, .col-md-, .col-lg-, .col-xl- to define column widths at different screen sizes

Fluid Gutterless Grids

  • Add .row-gutterless to a .row to remove all gutters
  • Fluid gutterless rows do not need to be placed inside .section-container-fluid
.col-md-2
.col-md-4
.col-md-2
.col-md-4

Fixed Gutterless Grids

  • Place a gutterless grid inside .section-container
